category-def.name: net.sf.rcer
category-def.label: SAP R/3 Connector
category-def.description: RCER is a SAP R/3 Connector for Eclipse Rich Client Platform applications. It wraps up the SAP Java Connector (JCo) in a reusable way and provides additional common functions like connection definition, login dialog and status monitoring. Note that the installation process is more complex than for other plug-in projects you might know. Please take a look at the documentation before installing these plug-ins (or at least after you have run into the first error messages).
